page.title: 13Clothing:Materials/Uniform
page.content: Materials for clothing today are {wool, acryllic, cotton, polyester and nylon.} These are hard wearing and comfortable. Many clothes are made from combinations of these materilas for maximum strength and comfort. At our school we wear a {uniform}. The girls wear a grey skirt, pale blue shirt or blouse, royal blue jersey or cardigan and school tie. In summer the girls can wear a blue and white checked dress. Most girls wear white socks. The boys wear grey trousers, pale blue shirt, royal blue jersey and school tie. In the summer some boys wear short trousers. Most boys wear grey socks. The jerseys are made of wool or acryllic material. Shirts are made of cotton or cotton and polyester, trousers and skirts are made of wool and polyester.
